dct_title_s: L'AMERICA SETTENTRIONALE Nuouamente corretta, et accresciuta secondo le relationi piu moderne, da GVGLIELMO SANSONE Geografo di S.M. Christianis
dct_description_sm: Dated 1687, and with a coastline added from Agubela de Cato northwards, "Stretto d'ANIAN" named at 60 deg.N., and "MARE DI CALIFORNIA" named to west of California, and many internal features added above 45 deg.N.
California as an island with indented northern coast, with Agubela de Cato to north. Engraved by: Giorgio Widman Sculp. (lower right). Italian edition of revised version (1669) of Sanson's 1650 map.
E data in luce da GIO.GIACOMO DE ROSSI.
Issued in Rossi's: Mercurio geografico ... , Rome, 1692-94, V.1,no.6. Reissued in 1692-1714, V.2,no.186.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
